readConfigFile(String) - Static method in class autoChirp.preProcessing.HeidelTimeWrapper

readUserConfig() - Method in class workflowTests.DBInputOutputTest
read userConfig from DB
run(int, int) - Method in class autoChirp.tweeting.TwitterConnection
updates the users twitter-status to the tweets content. 1. reads the tweet with the given tweetID from the database 2. checks if the related tweetGroup is still enabled and tweet wasn't tweeted already 3. reads the users oAuthToken and oAuthTokenSecret from the database 4. updates the users twitter status to the tweets tweetContent
run() - Method in class autoChirp.tweeting.TwitterTask
creates a new TwitterConnection
